**As a** [role]  
 **I need** [function]  
 **So that** [benefit]  
   
 ### Details and Assumptions
 * [document what you know]
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Feature [High-level description]
 Scenario [How works]
 Given [some context]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
 And [Any additional steps]

 ```
